chargeHist.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) was dismissed by the court.

  • Russel Joseph Magnuson was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Russel Joseph Magnuson in court with attorney Thomas W Duffy.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 16 CF 59 and 16 CF 63.   State recites agreement 15 CF 272: plea NC to count 2 OWI 4th - $2122.00 - 230 days jail credit 30 days time served stayed to complete on electronic monitor  - 27 mo. revocation - AODA with VIP and 27 MO. IID - balance of counts are to be DRI
16 CF 59 and and 16 CF 63  State moved to amend to Misd. Bail Jumping - Sentence w/held probation 2 years - absolute sobriety and counseling and costs.  State grants motion to amend 15 CF 59 and 15 CF 63 to misd. Bail Jumping.  DE entered Plea of NC to 16 CF 272, 16 CF 59 and 16 CF 63.    DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  Court advised the DE as to the relationship between his attorney and himself.  DE wishes to continue/State wishes to continue.  Court finds defendant guilty.

15 CF 272:  Fine $2122.00 given 30 days to pay or set up payment plan - 27 months DL revoked retro to any admin. suspension - IID 27 months - AODA with VIP - 230 days county jail with credit for 30 days time served to be served on the electronic monitor as part of STOP report to stop after court today  /  balance of counts are dismissed and read-in - bail to be applied towards fine
